}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The device is an [[Alpha Networks WUS-N02]]. The FCC ID of the parent OEM model (RRK2007050038) has been assigned to this device.
"8WUSN02..0B1G" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
